chmod 700 ${CHEZMOISOURCEDIR}

exists $HOME${/}.bashrc
exists $HOME${/}.inputrc
chezmoi apply --remove
! exists $HOME${/}.bashrc
exists $HOME${/}.inputrc

-- home/user/.bashrc --
# contents of .bashrc
-- home/user/.inputrc --
# contents of .inputrc
-- home/user/.local/share/chezmoi/.chezmoiremove --
.bashrc
